page: EC60091: Machine Intelligence And Expert Systems

title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Pre-requisites: NoneIntroduction to AI, Concept learning and general-tospecific ordering, Decision Tree Learning, Artificial Neural Netwok, Bayesian learning, genetic algorithm, Problem Space Representation, Heuristic Search Techniques, Knowledge Representation, Predicate Logic Reasoning Under Uncertainty, Statistical Reasoning, Game Playing, Planning, Learning, Expert System Design, Expert System Shell, Case Studies of Typical Expert Systems, PROLOG.
